text: Harison da Silva Nery or simply Harison (born 2 January 1980 in Belém), is a Brazilian attacking midfielder. ==Biography== On 1 March 2010, Harison moved to China and signed a contract with Chengdu Blades He is the older brother of the fellow retired footballer, Hadson Nery. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
